00108 
00109 template <typename T_val>
00110 void uvm_ml_config_rsrc::call_db(uvm_ml_resource_notify_action action,
00111                                  const char *                  cntxt,
00112                                  const char *                  item_scope,
00113                                  const char *                  item_name,
00114                                  T_val                         val)
00115 {
00116     switch(action)
00117     {
00118     case UVM_ML_RESOURCE_SET:
00119         uvm_resource_db<T_val>::set_default(item_scope, item_name);
00120         break;
00121 
00122     case UVM_ML_RESOURCE_SET_DEFAULT:
00123         uvm_resource_db<T_val>::set(item_scope, item_name, val);
00124         break;
00125 
00126     case UVM_ML_RESOURCE_SET_OVERRIDE:
00127     case UVM_ML_RESOURCE_SET_OVERRIDE_NAME:
00128         uvm_resource_db<T_val>::set_override(item_scope, item_name, val);
00129         break;
00130 
00131     case UVM_ML_RESOURCE_WRITE_BY_NAME:
00132         uvm_resource_db<T_val>::write_by_name(item_scope, item_name, val);
00133         break;
00134     
00135     case UVM_ML_CONFIG_SET:
00136         uvm_config_db<T_val>::set(cntxt, item_scope, item_name, val);
00137         break;
00138 
00139         default:
00140             break;
00141     };
00142 }   // call_db()
